definition: to overtax/to extort
surname Bao
sudden/violent/cruel/to show or expose/to injure

to hold back/to restrain/to control (oneself)/to collect/Taiwan pr. [lian4]

sentences.english: Because of requisitions, land was being abandoned and whole families were drowning themselves in village wells.
sentences.chinese: 横征暴敛使土地荒芜，整家整户的人被迫投井自杀。

sentences.english: Crazy sign overtaxing the people under the Empire, the inevitable intensification of internal conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 狂征暴敛之下，帝国内部矛盾必然激化。

definition: to waste natural resources recklessly/not to know how to use things sparingly
